title: The Case of Ayumi's Illustrated Diary

infobox.Title:: The Case of Ayumi's Illustrated Diary
infobox.Japanese title:: 歩美の絵日記事件簿  (Ayumi no Enikki Jiken-bo)
infobox.English title:: The Case of Ayumi's Illustrated Diary
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Wataru Takagi  Hiroshi Agasa  Miwako Sato
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta and Nobuyuki Iwai (supervisors)  Kenichi Otomo

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Koji Ochiai as Keita Kaneko  Hiroshi Naka as Sadaharu Nishimura  Noriko Uemura as Masako Ogino  Makoto Furukawa as Yuji Fujioka

sections.Characters introduced:
- 57 years old
- Kaneko Jewelry Store owner
sections.Situation:
One day, Conan, Haibara, and the Detective Boys are walking to school, when they notice Sadaharu Nishimura, Masako Ogino, and Yuji Fujioka admiring an expensive watch displayed at Kaneko Jewelry Store. The watch itself is only one of five produced around the world.
After school, they meet Takagi, who is handing out leaflets about robbery around the district. Conan then start thinking about the possibility of the watch being stolen.

Several days later, Ayumi shows her picture diary book to Conan. After seeing the pictures in the diary, Conan deduces the culprit.

sections.Trivia:
- The Case of Ayumi's Illustrated Diary 2 is the sequel of this episode.
- Kaneko Jewelry Store and its owner, Café Haronbo, and Ogino Produce Store reappear in The Lost Article That Smells Like a Case. The same jewelry store also reappears in My Beloved Dog Pan-kun Is a Good Boy.
- Like The Secret of the High Sales, this episode has an element of Red-Headed League from Sherlock Holmes short story.
- The spa's painting in Ogino Produce Store is the next hint from The Ventriloquist's Illusion. Open spoiler box to see images.
